channel.title: Csleesburg on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Csleesburg on ZooBerry

item.title: Anniversary Staff
item.description: A new staff to celebrate Zoo Admin’s 5th Anniversary! Special Uniforms and Podium for all your staff including the Vendors.

item.title: Animal Print Fences
item.description: A pack of six animal print fences for your zoo.

item.title: Christmas Fountain
item.description: A colorful fountain for Christmas exhibits.

item.title: Christmas Trashcan
item.description: A festive trashcan for Christmas exhibits.

item.title: Rainy Elevated Path
item.description: A rainy-themed elevated path for exhibits.

item.title: Spiderweb Gazebo
item.description: A Spiderweb Gazebo for your spooky Halloween zoo.

item.title: Starry Elevated Path
item.description: A starry elevated path for exhibits.

item.title: Alpine Cat Climber
item.description: An Alpine Cat Climber for alpine-based cats.

item.title: Jungle Ruins Cat Climber
item.description: A Jungle Ruins Cat Climber for Tropical Rainforest cats.

item.title: Snowy Cat Climber
item.description: A snowy Cat Climber for snow-bound cats.

item.title: Abisara Geza Niya Butterfly for MM
item.description: This is a Temperate Forest and Wetlands butterfly, named Abisara geza niya (it has no ‘common’ name). She’s found mostly in the Far and Middle East (Singapore, Malaysia, Afghanistan). She’s brown with a lovely marked back.

item.title: African Butterfly
item.description: An ambient African Sangrias butterfly. She is the only blood-red butterfly in the world and lives in the Savannah, Desert and Grassland. Requires ES to work.

item.title: Blue Jay
item.description: A blue jay that flies over your zoo, commonly found in boreal and temperate forests.

item.title: Cairns Birdwing Butterfly
item.description: Australia’s largest butterfly, commonly seen in rainforests and suburban areas.

item.title: Cardinal
item.description: A cardinal that flies over your zoo, commonly found in North America.

item.title: Eclectus Parrot
item.description: A bird that flies over your zoo. Parrots are brightly colored birds, with males and females displaying distinct plumage.

item.title: Egyptian Vulture
item.description: A scavenging bird that flies over your zoo, famous for using stones to break eggs.

item.title: Malachite Butterfly
item.description: A bright green butterfly with shiny copper trimmings, often seen flying over MM waters.

item.title: Mourning Cloak Butterfly
item.description: A butterfly that appears randomly in your zoo, found near rivers and wetlands.

item.title: Peacock Butterfly
item.description: A butterfly that appears randomly in your zoo, commonly found in grasslands and forests.

item.title: Rainbow Lorikeet
item.description: A bird that flies over your zoo. Rainbow lorikeets are active, noisy, and gregarious birds.

item.title: Rice Paper Butterfly
item.description: A butterfly that appears randomly in your zoo, often seen in forests and grasslands.

item.title: Sun Conure
item.description: Golden-feathered birds with green wing tips, Sun Conures are playful and colorful.

item.title: Yellow Clouded Sulphur Butterfly
item.description: A butterfly that appears randomly in your zoo, found worldwide.

item.title: Boreal Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Savannah Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Scrub Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Temperate Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Tundra Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Yellow Jellyfish
item.description: Due to their extreme rarity, very little is known about the yellow jellyfish.
